185986970.review: Peggle is my go to game! I have been playing this game for quite a few years and I never tire of it. Its fun and challenging. I really like the challenge levels, some of them are really difficult. It's a great game to play if I just want to relax and unwind.

185928536.review: This game is genuinely amazing. I originally bought it as a joke but everything about it is brilliant. The sound design, the graphics, the gameplay. There is no game better than this

185917936.review: another of the popcap greats. some good chill fun.

185898920.review: Around 9 hours of gameplay plus fun challenges and stuff. I love pegging day and night.

185035746.review: where do i even begin? Peggle is a great puzzle game that’s a classic for a reason! it’s an amazing scorebased game that’s a wonderful time waster. there is a collection of fun characters and the game art and soundtrack wise is brimming with personality. I love peggle.

185010591.review: genuinely might be one of the best games ive ever played the story the lore its just everything peggle pegs me and ive never been happier

184996223.review:
Peggle is one of the most masterfully crafted video games of all time. Hours feel like seconds when I play this game. I have invested hundreds of thousands of dollars in specialty hardware to prevent me from ever needing to leave my computer at any point in time so that I can continue to peg without interruption. Everytime I replay the adventure mode I am just as emotionally moved as the first time I played. The story reveals a deep, thought-provoking commentary on society, which I mustn't spoil for those who have not yet played. Completely groundbreaking.

I also liked the part where Bjorn says "It's peggin' time."

184764647.review: Peggle. Simply the best thing ever made. Hello everyone, I don't really know where to start, but I guess I'll begin with what this game has done for me. Peggle may be seen as a game any child can play and understand; however, in reality, it's far different from that. If you really take a deep dive into your feelings while playing this game, you'll soon come to realize that no child could truly understand the meaning this game has to offer. It's funny; I now consider myself to be one of the enlightened ones that truly understand the complexity and maturity it takes to play this game; however, I still find myself thinking at night, "What does Jimmy Lightning really mean when he says "Tubular?"". Now I know what you're thinking: he probably just means that he likes the play you just made, but, sadly, it's not that simple. To keep it short and sweet, Peggle has changed my life for the better. It has done so much for me, and I encourage you to please play this game and reflect deeply upon yourself as you play. I promise you will not regret looking in upon yourself and finding your meaning of life.

184761910.review: Perfect game for those who enjoy shooting ballz into buckets.

184707203.review: This game made me die, cry, not sleep, depressed and i finnaly beat it

184700786.review:
Im SOOO gladw i picked this up!
I played Peggle back in the day, when it first came out.......it is a perfect game, still got that cheesy game shine, and absurdity....within a solid break out game.
Totally recommend.

184545273.review: THE ZEN OH YES I LOVE THE ZEN i was being kidnapped by a sex trafficker and my holes where about be accessed by a group of men until i saw one of them playing Peggle Deluxe a unicorn was on his screen and me and him locked eyes his name was Bjorn I WAS LIKE WOAH this unicorn is so sexy and so beautiful his mane was so luscious and in my dying moments of my *sshole being destroyed all i could think of is this unicorn then one of the men said "hey you have been looking at this unicorn alot want to play Peggle with us?" i said YEAH and from enemys to friends we all played Peggle with each other. After that surprising turn of events they let me go home. When i got home i was greeted by my grandmother and she said "WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN AND WHY ARE YOU OILED UP!!!" so i threw a f*cking zen ball at her face and my fever meter started going up WOW 100000 POINTS!!! this game truly changed and saved my life.

For the Peggle is Immortal

184117556.review:
Those who have dared to trudge through the horrors stored beneath the thin layer of cosmic beauty showcased in Peggle Deluxe Level 11-2 know that the idea of a merciful existence is one born out of the naive. The fools at PopCap were fueled by pure, unadulterated hubris, and it blinded them to create this unholy construct, a Promethean endeavor with no other purpose than to burn the souls of those who thought to challenge it. A gross zenith stemmed from mankind's stubbornness, carrying with it an unyielding hatred for everything humanity stands for simply by existing. 

7/10. The pumpkin power up's pretty cool.

184007410.review:
While extremely easy - this game can also be pretty good at pulling your leg. Point & click is basically the game-play ontop of a series of pachinko style peg-boards with physics at times bordering nutty, and then like 10 characters with a unique skill each to help you out. Nice short romp to break up the monotony of other games.

It's pretty fun too - I mean, this review only comes after me having played this through 3x over the past 15 or so years LOL ([i]once on WinXP via disk even![/i])

183903368.review:
This game changed my life. Ever since I've played Peggle my life has turned around. My wife came back, my hair grew back, I bought oil, and I hear a sudden Ode to Joy whenever I open a door. 
Thank you, Peggle.

183874112.review:
i bought after playing peggle blast. IN MY OPINION (dont come after me please) peggle blast is much better, as its mechanics are much more enjoyable and are fun to conquer, and it has much more levels for its price (this game took me 4 hours to beat the main levels)

if you really enjoy the general peggle series, still get the game, its not expensive, and its fun for a lil while, although it is also easier than peggle blast.

Game from 2007.

I think it is fun game to spend a short while :)
